attributes.action: elect John Barrowman as the UK entry for Eurovision 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 5th place is just not good enough!  We feel that John Barrowman would have a good chance of winning the Eurovision Song Contest for the UK next year.  He can sing, he can dance, he can act, he can judge, he can present - what more do you need?!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
